content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'SILVER_CLIENTE_DDM' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE_DDM
	(
	 [ID_CLIENTE] int,
     [CPF] VARCHAR(14),
     [EMAIL]VARCHAR(50),
	 [NOME_CLIENTE] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ENDERECO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [NUMERO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ID_CIDADE] int,
	 [CEP] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

select * from dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE_DDM
